name: Frontline Military Shooting
description:
Frontline Military Shooting will be the first game of action lovers with plenty of levels ever. You will taste the real mental assault course during play this game. If you think you know all military training basic combat then it is the time to go through like a secret agent and become successful and get US army National Guard and army reserve because nothing is tougher than this US army secret mission.
You are a real rebel military soldier against the enemies because you have all types of guns to deal the evil enemies like you can use the sniper gun to target the enemy. You are a secret agent on this survival mission to save the hosts. You are hired on this spy mission as a secret agent to kill enemy squad.

Features:
* Real to life sounds to engage you.
* Colorful and vivid HD graphics.
* Thrilling battles.
* Use powerful skills to fight off enemies.
* Involving game play.
* Real looking 3d battlefield environment.
* Efficient & perfect arms controls.
* Friendly & easy ui.
* Realistic war fighting action.
